title: BodyCount.SmokeOut.6.2001.DVDRip.jiveroz.avi
description:
Set against the backdrop of worst fires in Californian history, The Sixth Annual SmokeOut Festival, featured over 40 world class artists on four stages at the NOS Events Center in San Bernardino, California.
Taking to stage in front of 60,000 fans, Ice-T and Body Count's set became one of the most talked about performaces of SmokeOut 2003.
Despite the torrential rain and equiptment problems, hte band blazed through hits like "KKK Bitch" and the "End Game", exceeding their time set, and setting off a chain of delays in true metal tradition.
Body Count's trademark brad of angry, gnash-your-teeth rap and metal had fans roaring, shouting for them to continue playing despite the stage crews threats to shut them down.
These threats were answered to, with Ice breaking into hits "There Goes The Neighbourhood" and "Cop Killer", further igniting a chorus of wild fans moshing and chanting every word.

Set List Played
1. Body Count's In The House
2. Body M/F House
3. Masters of Revenge
4. Killin' Floor
5. Bowels of The Devil
6. KKK Bitch
7. Drive By
8. End Game
9. There Goes The Neighbourhood
10. Cop Killer

Enjoy - Seed - Feedback

*******************************************************
Life is like being a dog in a sled team !
If you ain't the lead dog, the scenery never changes !!
{8*) Jiveroz
